name: Puzzle Platformer (ArjunGameDev)
description:
Hello everyone, My name is Arjun. This is my first game and my first ever game jam. Im 9 yrs old and Im from India. This is for GMTK Game Jam 2021 - for the theme "Joined Together" . There are four levels in this game. We have two players - one player can collect fruits and the other player can collect the cup. Together when they achieve the goal, they can move to next step. The game also has puzzle - which the player has to identify in order to colllect the fruits and cup. Please download and play and share your valuable feedback.  

#CREDITS - Pixel Adventure 1,Kings And Pigs, FreeGUI
